snippet: But President Hugo Chávez appeared unlikely to grant concessions to the opposition, despite its best showing against him.
abstract: Venezuelan Pres Hugo Chavez follows up on his least convincing election victory with appeal for national unity, but it appears unlikely that he will grant concessions to the opposition, despite its relatively strong showing.
lead_paragraph: But President Hugo Chávez appeared unlikely to grant concessions to the opposition, despite its best showing against him.

headline.seo: Hugo Chávez Calls for Unity After Victory in Venezuela
headline.main: Chávez Calls for Unity After Victory in Venezuela
headline.print_headline: Chávez Calls For Unity After Victory In Venezuela
